name: Venom
aliases: Spider-Man , The Black Suit, Alien Costume
powersText: Grants the host all the powers of its first known host, Spider-Man (Superhuman strength and ability to cling to most surfaces) Limited  shapeshifting Invisibility through  camouflage Ability of the Symbiote to fight and defend itself when either the host or it is in danger Undetectable by Spider-Man's "Spider-sense"
